spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The musketeer is a 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: War Magic
entries: When the musketeer uses its action to cast a spell, it can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Firearms Training
entries: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn’t impose disadvantage on the musketeer’s

trait.name: Silver Weapons
entries: The musketeer weapons are enchanted, and cause two extra dice on damage.

action.name: Silver Saber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or lose 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the musketeer hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 16} Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Silver Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d4 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tenser Silver Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d4 + 5}) piercing damage, plus 13 ({@damage 2d12}) force damage.

action.name: Tenser Silver Saber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage, plus 13 ({@damage 2d12}) force damage.

If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or lose 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the musketeer hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 16} Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.
Many creatures enjoy torture, but the dark elves have made it into an exquisite art.

entries.name: Drow Favored Consort
entries: Nearly all priestesses of {@deity Lolth|drow|mtf}, including the powerful matron mothers, take attractive drow as their consorts. Often these individuals serve no purpose beyond pleasure, breeding, or both, but sometimes consorts can gain the ear of their priestess and be relied on to provide useful advice. No position of consort is assured for long; priestesses are infamous for being fickle with their favor, which are they are especially glad to lavish on a consort who combines beauty with magical might.
